COMMUNITY We are committed to the guest in providing a welcoming, casual and fun environment with exceptional food at a great value. What Our Customers Say Chicken Wings for John Jeffcoat ★★★★★ Great local spot. Staff & super friendly & they provide great service. Great place to watch a football game. John Jeffcoat Restaurant and Bar for B W ★★★★★ Please bring back your amazing chicken salad! B W Sports Restaurant for Seth Burnette ★★★★★ I just have to say that the value, price, and customer service at Kickin Chicken in Mt. Pleasant are amazing! I usually order food for my friends from different restaurants on Fridays. After a recent recommendation, I decided to try Kickin’ Chicken, and I'm so happy I did. We ordered wings, fries, Read More Seth Burnette Restaurant Near Me for Trina H ★★★★★ It was a beautiful evening, so we sat outside. I had the pulled pork sandwich special with tots. The tots were cooked perfectly. We had some Bobbie fries for an appetizer and they were yummy. The chicken tenders were great too. Trina H Sports Pub for Curtis Green ★★★★★ One of the best burgers I have ever had. The Bobby fries were excellent. Curtis Green Local Sports Restaurant for Summer MCall ★★★★★ The food was really good and all came very fast. Our server was Maggie and she was phenomenal!!! Summer MCall Local Pubs for Robert Bell ★★★★★ Visit weekly, Great wings. Cold Beer. Great Wraps.! Ariel, Shawna, Mckenzie, Johanna, Grant are all great bartenders! Robert Bell Buffalo Wings for Justin Sharp ★★★★★ Loved the experience. It was my first time in Charleston area and my first time to the south. My first time for chicken and waffles and it was AMAZING! My boyfriend and I talk about it a lot. We will be going to eat here again when we come back to visit. It’s been two years since we were there so Read More Justin Sharp Chicken Wings for Bill Walters ★★★★★ Great service good food. Fast and friendly. Bill Walters Restaurant and Bar for Isabell M ★★★★★ Very friendly staff welcomed us and was flexible with seating so that highchair can fit next to the table. The food (loaded fries, CBLT wraps, and salad) was delicious. Isabell M Sports Restaurant for bonehead73 bonehead73 ★★★★★ Food was fantastic! bonehead73 bonehead73 Restaurant Near Me for Bill Jeanguenat ★★★★★ wings were a bit smallish, but that can flux. Bill Jeanguenat Sports Pub for Justin Grocki ★★★★★ Whenever in Charleston I always try and make it a point to come here. I highly recommend the Chicken and Waffles. The chicken is hand breaded and fried to perfection. The waffle was hot and crispy plus, they either use a sweet batter or put something in the batter to make it sweet. All in all for the Read More Justin Grocki Local Sports Restaurant for A H ★★★★★ Delicious. Will definitely return. A H Local Pubs for Greg Shuart ★★★★★ Great food, our waitress was friendly and fun. Great experience. Greg Shuart Buffalo Wings for Tom Smith ★★★★★ 2 of the best bartenders in town, Kayla and Sam, always a good time with them Tom Smith Chicken Wings for Lindsay Kale ★★★★★ We love this place- and added bonus that there is open air seating at a bar and outdoor table and chairs. But what would make this better is a location on Clements Ferry! There are plenty of open retail units and new builds so please come check it out! Lindsay Kale Restaurant and Bar for Stephanie Sorrentino ★★★★★ We love going to kicken chicken, especially during football season. Would love for you to open a location on Clements Ferry!! Stephanie Sorrentino Sports Restaurant for Greg Butts ★★★★★ Cold beer good wings Greg Butts Restaurant Near Me for Lisa Williamson ★★★★★ Excellent food and service! Lisa Williamson Sports Pub for Mike Jefferson ★★★★★ Went there for the Playoffs on Peacock and it was crowded. Staff was helpful and accommodating. We were served professionally in spite of the crowd. Highly recommend the staff and service. Mike Jefferson Local Sports Restaurant for Pattie Kinowski ★★★★★ Love this place!! Great atmosphere and a few games for kids. We enjoyed the food, service and drinks. A must visit Pattie Kinowski Local Pubs for Kevin Parham ★★★★★ Make sure to get there early enough on Sunday to get the football game you want to see. Kevin Parham Buffalo Wings for Mid-County Water ★★★★★ Salad was amazing!! Mid-County Water Chicken Wings for Debbie Boettcher ★★★★★ Ordered 4 dozen wings for Christmas party, they packaged nicely so I was able to keep warm in oven for party, provided abundant amount of blue cheesing dressing napkins and hand wipes, they exceeded our expectations 10 plus Debbie Boettcher | © 2024 Kickin Chicken. All rights reserved.
